indications: ambrisentan indicated treatment pulmonary arterial hypertension ( pah ) ( group 1 ) adult patients : • improve exercise ability delay worsening . establishing effectiveness included predominantly patients functional class ii–iii symptoms etiologies idiopathic heritable pah ( 60 % ) pah associated connective tissue diseases ( 34 % ) .
contraindications: • initiate treatment 5 mg daily ( 2.1 ) . • titrate 4-week intervals needed tolerated ( 2.1 ) . • split , crush , chew tablets ( 2.1 ) .
warningsAndPrecautions: ambrisentan film-coated tablets supplied follows : tablet strength package configuration ndc . description tablet ; debossed tablet 5 mg 30 count carton ( 3 x 10 unit-dose ) 47335-236-64 round biconvex ; pale pink ; debossed “ 236 ” one side plain side . 30 count bottle 47335-236-83 10 count bottle 47335-236-85 10 count carton ( 1 x 10 unit-dose ) 47335-236-66 10 mg 30 count carton ( 3 x 10 unit-dose ) 47335-237-64 oval biconvex ; deep pink ; debossed “ 237 ” one side plain side . 30 count bottle 47335-237-83 10 count bottle 47335-237-85 10 count carton ( 1 x 10 unit-dose ) 47335-237-66 store 20° 25°c ( 68° 77°f ) ; excursions permitted 15° 30°c ( 59° 86°f ) . [ usp controlled room temperature ] . store ambrisentan original packaging .
indications_original:
Ambrisentan is indicated for the treatment of pulmonary arterial hypertension (PAH) (WHO Group 1) in adult patients:  
                      • To improve exercise ability and delay clinical worsening.
                      Studies establishing effectiveness included predominantly patients with WHO Functional Class II–III symptoms and etiologies of idiopathic or heritable PAH (60%) or PAH associated with connective tissue diseases (34%).
contraindications_original: • Initiate treatment at 5 mg once daily (2.1). • Titrate at 4-week intervals as needed and tolerated (2.1). • Do not split, crush, or chew tablets (2.1).
